item.description:
The Red Sox Natives have been organizing Patriots Game Watching Events over the past 3 months with up to 60 people attending at Boston, Wakefield and Woburn venues.

Now it is time for the Red Sox Natives first Happy Hour of 2012 followed by a Bruins Game Viewing option. 

Harrington's Food and Spirits in downtown Wakefield is a cozy Irish Restaurant and Pub with two floors. We have been there before. The food is great and the full menu will be available for purchase. 

Arrive early by 6:00 PM and get yourself a prime seat and enjoy some pre-game socializing. Stop by for drinks, stay for dinner and stick around to watch the Bruins game.  Or arrive  later and stay until when ever. 

Game Time is 7:05 PM for the Bruins vs the New Jersey Devils.

There is free parking in downtown Wakefield in the public lot across from Harrington's in front of Bank of America and along Water and Main Streets. The location is T accessible by the 136 and 137 Bus from the Orange Line in Malden Center. And Commuter Rail accessible from North Station via the Reading and Haverhill Trains stopping at Wakefield Station with a less than 10 minute walk up Albion Street, right on to Main Street and 1 block to Water Street. If you are joining us from the City this is the way to go.

There is no cover.

Everyone is responsible for their own food/drink. PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER AND TIP YOUR SERVERS! 

Please RSVP early if you think you can attend. Invite, guests, friends, and co-workers. Soon we will invite several other groups to join us so space may become limited. Let's have as many Natives there as possible and take over Harrington's once again!

The following groups are being invited:

Wakefield Weeknights

Boston Happy Hour

We hope to see you there.

Fenway Frank and The Red Sox Natives Team
item.how_to_find_us: Ask Lisa, Dan or the Hostess for the Red Sox Natives reserved section on the first floor at the bar
item.name: Happy Hour followed by Bruins Game Viewing at Harrington's Irish Pub
